segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and I’m shocked the woman hasn’t noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying a plate like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids behind her, and I’m worried they’re going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn around and see what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will ever stop running or if the kids will ever get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a slow-motion accident about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where you just hold your breath and wait.
segments.speaker: PAR
